attributes.action: Allocate £100 Million per year of Lottery Funds to the National Trust to Repair all of their Houses/Buildings.
attributes.additional_details:
Allocate £100 million of Lottery Funding per year over 30 years to the National Trust to Repair all of their Houses/Buildings many of these properties need urgent repairs. This will create local work, apprentices to learn new skills and local quarry work.
(Lottery Funding = £2000 million per year so this is a small sum out of a big fund)

This will keep our Heritage in good order and will create good local jobs.

rejection.details: Decisions are made by the Heritage Lottery Fund, not the Government.
